text-align: left;
div.span: - Create (req_tx, req_rx) unix socket channel for ConnectorRequests

div.style: text-align: left;

div.div: - Create (resp_tx, resp_rx) unix socket channel for ConnectorResponses

div.style: text-align: left;

div.div: - Bind to UNIX socket and send through req_tx and resp_rx to next connected

div.style: text-align: left;

div.div: consensus driver. Wait until consensus driver connects.

div.style: text-align: left;

div.div: - Clone driver_req_tx and keep receiving messages on req_rx. Once disconnect

div.style: text-align: left;

div.div: message is received or timeout occurs, close socket and loop again.

div.style: text-align: left;
